name: netflix-mern
description: A Netlfix clone where Users can get authenticated to watch Movies, Series of the different genres available in the list category. The Admin can add Movies, and Series and can categorise them in different lists. All the CRUD operations on Users, Movies/Series, and Lists have been implemented using REST APIS.

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run install-admin
scripts.watch: npm run server && npm run client && npm run admin
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix admin && npm start --prefix server
